news.title: Violent Channel smuggling gang's French and UK network exposed by undercover BBC investigation
news.summary: Exclusive: Secret filming reveals smugglers' forest hideout and cash deals at UK train station.

news.title: Watch: Secret filming shows Channel gang associates take payment at UK station
news.summary: Two men met a BBC undercover reporter on the busy concourse at Birmingham's New Street Station.

news.title: Clintons subpoenaed in congressional Epstein investigation
news.summary: Former top officials from the justice department during the Obama, Trump and Biden administrations were sent subpoenas

news.title: Guidance for police on sharing suspects' ethnicity must change, home secretary says
news.summary: The home secretary's comments follow calls for details to be released of two men charged over an alleged rape.

news.title: What are the rules around police giving out a suspect's nationality?
news.summary: Home Secretary Yvette Cooper says guidance on what police reveal about suspects "needs to change".

news.title: Netanyahu to propose full reoccupation of Gaza, Israeli media report
news.summary: The plan will involve a complete takeover of Gaza, but reportedly faces opposition from military chiefs.

news.title: Corbyn attacks Rayner for selling off allotments
news.summary: The ex-Labour leader - and keen gardener - accuses ministers of threatening a British tradition.

news.title: Bridgerton actress tells BBC she's agoraphobic after phone theft that went viral
news.summary: Genevieve Chenneour says she no longer feels safe in London after a violent struggle in a café.

news.title: £100m of premium bond prizes remain unclaimed
news.summary: Critics want the system used to trace accounts to be reformed so people do not miss out on prizes.

news.title: Family pay tribute to Oasis fan who died at Wembley
news.summary: Lee Claydon, a 45-year-old from Bournemouth, died after falling from a height at Saturday's concert.
